update HANLINACADEMICIAN
UUID = #{record.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ID = #{record.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NAME = #{record.custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{record.gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{record.age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTH = #{record.birth,jdbcType=DATE},
CERT_TYPE = #{record.certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_NUM = #{record.certNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

WAGES_PAY_CUST_IND = #{record.wagesPayCustInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CURR_PAYROLL_AMT = #{record.currPayrollAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

HOUSE_MORTG_LOAN_CUST_IND = #{record.houseMortgLoanCustInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSELOAN_OVDUE_IND = #{record.houseloanOvdueInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTY_HOUSELOAN_CUST_IND = #{record.histyHouseloanCustInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVELCLASSCODE = #{record.levelclasscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NON_HOUSELOAN_IND = #{record.nonHouseloanInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTY_NON_HOUSELOAN_IND = #{record.histyNonHouseloanInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSELOAN_PRIN_BAL = #{record.houseloanPrinBal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSELOAN_MON_REPAYAMT = #{record.houseloanMonRepayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOUSELOAN_NEXTYEAR_REPAYAMT = #{record.houseloanNextyearRepayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_ONE_TM_PAYROLL_DT = #{record.lastOneTmPayrollDt,jdbcType=DATE},
PAYROLL_DT = #{record.payrollDt,jdbcType=DATE},
MON_AVG_PAYROLL_AMT = #{record.monAvgPayrollAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_AVG_PAYROLL_AMT = #{record.lastAvgPayrollAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_AVG_DPSIT = #{record.dayAvgDpsit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_AVG_FIN = #{record.dayAvgFin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_AVG_ASSET = #{record.dayAvgAsset,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS_NET_LOAN_REPAYMENT = #{record.statusNetLoanRepayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THIRD_CUSTODY_SIGN_IND = #{record.thirdCustodySignInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NET_CREDIT_CREDIT_LINE = #{record.netCreditCreditLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NET_CREDIT_DATE = #{record.netCreditDate,jdbcType=DATE},
NET_LOAN_PRINCIPAL_AMOUNT = #{record.netLoanPrincipalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAN_RELEASE_DATE = #{record.loanReleaseDate,jdbcType=DATE},
TIME_TO_APPLICATION_TIME = #{record.timeToApplicationTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENT_OVERDUE_DAYS = #{record.currentOverdueDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HISTY_OVERDUE_TIMES = #{record.histyOverdueTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HISTY_OVERDUE_NUMBER = #{record.histyOverdueNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_LOAN_PERIOD = #{record.totalLoanPeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAN_REPAYMENT_PERIOD = #{record.loanRepaymentPeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAN_APPROVAL_MODEL_SCORE = #{record.loanApprovalModelScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DPSIT_CUST_IND = #{record.dpsitCustInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHREM_CUST_IND = #{record.chremCustInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLL_REPAY_IND = #{record.collRepayInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CALL_COMPL_RATE = #{record.callComplRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COLL_MAX_CALL_DURA = #{record.collMaxCallDura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THEMAXTIMETOCALL_DURA = #{record.themaxtimetocallDura,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERD_DATE_TOTAL_PER = #{record.overdDateTotalPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURDATE_PAYROLL_PROVIDE = #{record.curdatePayrollProvide,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOAN_RATIO_MARCH = #{record.loanRatioMarch,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MONTH_SALARY_PAYOUT = #{record.monthSalaryPayout,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAVG_PAY_APP_RATIO = #{record.lavgPayAppRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BASE_LINE = #{record.baseLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT_ASSETS = #{record.amountAssets,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUOTA_ADJUSTMENT = #{record.quotaAdjustment,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SALARY_AMOUNT = #{record.salaryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUOTA_COEFFICIENT = #{record.quotaCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREDIT_LINE = #{record.creditLine,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

RATE_WHITELIST_CUST = #{record.rateWhitelistCust,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BLACKLIST_FLAG = #{record.blacklistFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISAMOUNTCREDITLIMITRATIO = #{record.disamountcreditlimitratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DUBIL_NUMBER = #{record.dubilNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUTTIME = #{record.inputtime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATETIME = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
LOAN_OVDUE_IND = #{record.loanOvdueInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
